instruction: Generate a children's story with the following title: The Magic Violin.
output:
Once upon a time, there was a small village nestled deep in the forest. In this village, there lived an old violin maker who had a very special violin in his workshop. He had crafted it with great care and attention, giving it a deep, rich sound. One day, a mysterious stranger appeared and asked to purchase the violin. Not wanting to part with it, the old man instead offered to teach the stranger how to play the violin. The stranger accepted, and began practicing with the violin every day. Soon, word spread throughout the village of how wonderful the music it made was, and people from all over came to hear the magical melodies of the mysterious stranger playing the old man's violin.
________

12. Instruction: Edit this text to make it more concise.
12. Input:
The garden of my grandparents was a beautiful place filled with an incredible variety of flowers and plants, and I used to love spending time there with my grandfather.
12. Output:
My grandparents' garden was a vibrant haven of flowers and plants, and I'd relish the time spent there with my grandfather.
